name: Gecko Moria
type: The Seven Warlords of the Sea/Thriller Bark Pirates
effect: [On Play] Select up to 1 {Thriller Bark Pirates} type Character with a cost of 4 or less from your trash and play it or add it to the top of your Life cards face-up.
trigger: [Trigger] Play up to 1 Character card with a cost of 4 or less from your trash.
